pages.text: Vervain is a military ship that has a VLS with 2 missile cells, two heavy caliber guns, two side guns and a shield generator. Using its shield it can take on multiple ships at once without sustaining any damage at all.
pages.title: Description

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/missile)$(l)Missile/$$(br)The VLS launches one of the missiles, $(l)dealing 2 damage to the selected tile/$. This ability has $(l)2 Uses/$ and costs $(l)7 Energy/$ to use.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/energy_shield)$(l)Shield Generator/$$(br)The shield generator provides a $(l)3 HP surrounding the ship/$.
pages.title: Passive Ability
